text: 12.10: Ro 5.3; 2 Ko 7.4; 13.4Maaŋ muuŋgiap, gu Kraisan ŋaarar muun zav, gu ŋkasŋka ki fhuv, kha gumgi buni mbatɨgir na nzuav na nzɨɨim, mbarkɨrga simtɨgi gu bigi mbatɨgi nan hɨrga, kha gumgi nan farfarga, gu Kraisan ŋaarar muunga tuav mpɨrarga, nan ndava vhee mbɨrigim, gu ki. Ne khaŋ muuŋgi, gu ŋkasŋka ki fhu, mba tugara, gu guigira ŋkasŋka ki.
